XHEADER.Title: Workflow to stop an EC2 instance
Workflow to terminate all EC2 Instances
Check that a given host is reachable

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
echo off ping &EC2_PRIVATE_IP# @set RETCODE=%errorlevel%
IF "%RETCODE%" EQU "0" ( echo HOST REACHABLE exit 0 ) IF "%RETCODE%" NEQ "0" ( echo HOST UNREACHABLE exit 1 )

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :PRINT Current Status of Image ID &INSTANCEID#: &STATUS# :IF &STATUS# <> "running" : PRINT Instance is not in RUNNING state. : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="EC2 Instance not in Running state" : PRINT Exit with RETCODE 1800 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1800 :ELSE : PRINT EC2 Instance is in RUNNING state. :ENDIF

XHEADER.Title: Publish Agent Name calculated from EC2 DNS Name

SCRIPT.MSCRI: : DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 5 : FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&PRIVATE_DNS_NAME#,".") : SET &AGENTNAME# = CONV_UC(&STRINGS#[1]) : PUBLISH &AGENTNAME#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &STATUS#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &LAUNCH_TIME#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &INSTANCE_ID#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &PRIVATE_DNS_NAME#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &PRIVATE_IP#,,"WORKFLOW" ! Printing Published Variables : PRINT "Agent Name = &AGENTNAME#" : PRINT "Image Status = &STATUS#" : PRINT "Launch Time = &LAUNCH_TIME#" : PRINT "Instance ID = &INSTANCE_ID#" : PRINT "Private DNS Name = &PRIVATE_DNS_NAME#" : PRINT "Private IP Adr = &PRIVATE_IP#"

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><AMI_IDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="AMI_ID#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">ami-f6b4299e</AMI_IDs.00><REST_CONNs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="REST_CONN#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">TEMPLATE.CONN.EC2.US_EAST_1</REST_CONNs.00><INSTANCE_SIZEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="INSTANCE_SIZE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">m3.xlarge</INSTANCE_SIZEs.00><KEYPAIRs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="KEYPAIR#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">US-KeyPair-ARADemo</KEYPAIRs.00><EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="1" promptname="EMAIL_NOTIFICATION#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">&$USER#@automic.com</EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &BNAME# = "/pgp" :SET &URL# = "https://prd-pw-microsites-us1n.s3.amazonaws.com/pgp/automictest3.gepower.com/" :PRINT &URL# :DEFINE &URLS#, string, 2 :FILL &URLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URL#,&BNAME#)
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&URLS#[])
:PSET &BASEURL# = &URLS#[1] :PSET &SHORTBASEURL# = STR_SUB(&BASEURL#,"https://","") :PSET &EXTURL# = STR_CAT(&BNAME#,&URLS#[2]) :PRINT "Full URL is &BASEURL#" :PRINT "Short URL is &SHORTBASEURL# " :PRINT "Extended URL is &EXTURL#"

:PSET &INSTANCENAME# = "ip-10-230-7-106.sbb01.spoc.global" :PRINT Instance Name is: &INSTANCENAME#
:DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 5 :FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&INSTANCENAME#,".") :PSET &AGENTNAMETEMP# = &STRINGS#[1] :PSET &AGENTNAME# = CONV_UC(&AGENTNAMETEMP#)
:PRINT Agent Name is: &AGENTNAME#
!:PRINT Instance ID is: &INSTANCEID#
:PRINT Instance Name is: &INSTANCENAME#

XHEADER.Title: Email Connection Information for New Instance

NOTIFICATION.Subject: Your new EC2 Instance is ready
NOTIFICATION.Text:
Hello,
Your EC2 Instance is now running.
The Public IP of your instance is &PRIVATE_IP#. The Public DNS Name of your instance is &PRIVATE_DNS_NAME#.

XHEADER.Title: Get a list of all EC2 Instances

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:PRINT Instance List Raw: &INSTANCE_LIST#
:DEFINE &INSTANCES#, string, 50 :FILL &INSTANCES#[] = STR_SPLIT(&INSTANCE_LIST#,"i-")
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&INSTANCES#[])
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# :SET &INSTANCE_NAME# = STR_CAT("i-",&INSTANCES#[&VAR#])
:IF &INSTANCE_NAME# <> "i-" : PRINT "Instance Name Found: &INSTANCE_NAME#" : put_var EC2.RUNNING.INSTANCES, "&INSTANCE_NAME#", "&INSTANCE_NAME#" :ENDIF
:SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 :ENDWHILE

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><INSTANCEIDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="INSTANCEID#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></INSTANCEIDs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

NOTIFICATION.Subject: Your new EC2 Instance is being stopped
NOTIFICATION.Text:
Hello,
Your EC2 Instance &INSTANCEID is being stopped.
It is currently in Status: &STATUS#

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
! Define the AMI ID for the Image selected !:pset &ami_id#="ami-f6b4299e"
! Set the Connection Object based on Region !:put_att restConnection='&rest_conn#'
! Define size of Instance !:pset &instance_size#=get_var(EC2.QUERY_INSTANCE_SIZE)

XHEADER.Title: Tag instance for identification in EC2 mgmt console

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
:PSET &INSTANCENAME# = GET_VAR(EC2.ACTIVE.INSTANCES,&INSTANCEID#,4) :PRINT Instance Name is: &INSTANCENAME#
:DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 5 :FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&INSTANCENAME#,".") :PSET &AGENTNAMETEMP# = &STRINGS#[1] :PSET &AGENTNAME# = CONV_UC(&AGENTNAMETEMP#)
:PRINT Agent Name is: &AGENTNAME#
:PRINT Instance ID is: &INSTANCEID#
:PRINT Instance Name is: &INSTANCENAME#

NOTIFICATION.Subject: Your new EC2 Instance and Agent are being terminated
NOTIFICATION.Text:
Hello,
Your EC2 Instance &INSTANCEID# is being terminated. It is currently in Status: &STATUS#
The corresponding Agent &AGENTNAME# has also been terminated.

param.name: XC_P01
param.value: Could Not Retrieve Private IP Adress from previous job

param.name: XC_P02
param.value: Could Not Reach Host after 4 retries.. aborting.

XHEADER.Title: Workflow to terminate an EC2 instance
